title: Confusion — and relief — at LAX following Trump's travel restrictions
text: The 33-year-old Eagle Rock resident spent the weekend panicking about what he’d do if his fiancee, a green card holder who traveled to Iran to visit her parents four days before the inauguration of President Trump , was barred from entering the country. Plan B, he said, was to fly her to stay with relatives in Canada, Europe or Armenia.
summary:
The 33-year-old Eagle Rock resident spent the weekend panicking about what he’d do if his fiancee, a green card holder who traveled to Iran to visit her parents four days before the inauguration of President Trump , was barred from entering the country.
Plan B, he said, was to fly her to stay with relatives in Canada, Europe or Armenia.
